Line of Fire.name: Line of Fire
Line of Fire.fullText:
Arrowhead Commander Attack 11Line of Fire

Your first shot unbalances your foe, leaving it open to your allies’ attacks. You follow up with a quick volley, striking enemies that sought to block the path to your foe.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a greatbow or a longbow.

Primary Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the primary target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack.

  Secondary Target: One or two creatures granting cover to the primary target.

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. AC

  Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 98.
Line of Fire.flavor: Your first shot unbalances your foe, leaving it open to your allies’ attacks. You follow up with a quick volley, striking enemies that sought to block the path to your foe.

Follow Through.name: Follow Through
Follow Through.fullText:
Arrowhead Commander Attack 20Follow Through

You use the enemies in front of your true target to redirect your shot to your foe.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a greatbow or a longbow.

Primary Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and any enemy granting cover to the primary target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Miss: If no creature is granting cover to the primary target, you don’t expend this power. Otherwise, make a secondary attack.

  Secondary Target: One creature granting cover to the primary target

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. AC

  Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and any enemy granting cover to the secondary target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

  Miss: Half damage.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 98.
Follow Through.flavor: You use the enemies in front of your true target to redirect your shot to your foe.

Ranged weapon

  Secondary Target: One creature granting cover to the primary target

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. AC

  Miss: Half damage.

Strike Here.name: Strike Here
Strike Here.fullText:
Arrowhead Commander Utility 12Strike Here

Like pins in a map, your arrows mark the vital spots on a foe’s body.

Daily        Martial, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a ranged attack, the next time an ally hits the target before the end of your next turn, he or she ignores the target’s resistances.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 98.
Strike Here.flavor: Like pins in a map, your arrows mark the vital spots on a foe’s body.

Personal
